lines.text: We're both going to have to pray much harder.
But Daddy! We won't be sports moguls anymore!

When God made Man, He made him outta string. He had a little left, so He left that little thing. When God made Woman, He made her outta lace. He didn't have enough, so He left that little space. Thank you, God!
Oh, son... you lay one finger on my daughter... and I'll kill ya!
If they gonna try to lynch me, I'm gonna take two or three of 'em with me!
Kid... let me tell you one of lifes great truths. All girls *fuck*.
Yeah, but this one's real religious...
When I said all girls, I meant *all girls*.

[walking out on Stud]
Dumbass! You really think the St Louis Cardinals want *you*?
